column3: Traffic;Kompong Speu Province------: An accident occurred between 3 vehicles occurred near the ‘dinosaur island’ on National Road 4 in Pich Nil
column4: 104-105 km a at 1 pm on 22 November.------A truck with RCAF plates
column5: a Camry and a Highlander were involved. ------According to local authorities
column6: two people were killed and five others injured. ------After the accident
